name: Xero Payroll UK
description: This is the Xero Payroll API for orgs in the UK region.

nodes.name: Get Employees
nodes.description: Retrieves employees

filter.description: Filter by first name, lastname, and/or whether they are an off-payroll worker

page.description: Page number which specifies the set of records to retrieve. By default the number of the records per set is 100.

timeout.description: Timeout specifies the number of milliseconds before the request times out. If the request takes longer than timeout, the request will be aborted.

problem.description: The object returned for a bad request

name.description: The name of the field that caused the error

reason.example: The Date of Birth is required.

employeeID.description: Xero unique identifier for the employee

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the employee (YYYY-MM-DD)

addressLine1.description: Address line 1 for employee home address

addressLine2.description: Address line 2 for employee home address

email.description: The email address for the employee

startDate.description: Employment start date of the employee at the time it was requested

endDate.description: Employment end date of the employee at the time it was requested

payrollCalendarID.description: Xero unique identifier for the payroll calendar of the employee

updatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the employee

createdDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp when the employee was created in Xero

startDate.description: The start date of the NI category (YYYY-MM-DD)

niCategoryID.description: Xero unique identifier for the NI category

dateFirstEmployedAsCivilian.description: The date in which the employee was first employed as a civilian (YYYY-MM-DD)

nationalInsuranceNumber.description: National insurance number of the employee

isOffPayrollWorker.description: Whether the employee is an off payroll worker

output.description: The object returned for a bad request

name.description: The name of the field that caused the error

reason.example: The Date of Birth is required.

statutoryLeaveID.description: The unique identifier (guid) of a statutory leave

employeeID.description: The unique identifier (guid) of the employee

leaveTypeID.description: The unique identifier (guid) of the "Statutory Sick Leave (non-pensionable)" pay item

startDate.description: The date when the leave starts

endDate.description: The date when the leave ends

workPattern.description: The days of the work week the employee is scheduled to work at the time the leave is taken

isPregnancyRelated.description: Whether the sick leave was pregnancy related

sufficientNotice.description: Whether the employee provided sufficient notice and documentation as required by the employer supporting the sick leave request

isEntitled.description: Whether the leave was entitled to receive payment

entitlementWeeksRequested.description: The amount of requested time (in weeks)

entitlementWeeksQualified.description: The amount of statutory sick leave time off (in weeks) that is available to take at the time the leave was requested

entitlementWeeksRemaining.description: A calculated amount of time (in weeks) that remains for the statutory sick leave period

overlapsWithOtherLeave.description: Whether another leave (Paternity, Shared Parental specifically) occurs during the requested leave's period. While this is allowed it could affect payment amounts

entitlementFailureReasons.description: If the leave requested was considered "not entitled", the reasons why are listed here.
